altername_name: ザ・ファミレス～史上最強のメニュー～
name: The Famires: Shijou Saikyou no Menu
overview: The Famires - Shijou Saikyou no Menu let's the player build his own restaurant empire in this strategy game in which he can controls all the elements of a restaurant: Select the place where you want the restaurant to be created. Contract or dismiss your employees (cooks, waitress, etc) Select the menu and meals. Contract publicity on tv, radio, newspapers, etc All of this with cartoon 2d graphics.
